common_issues.title: Pieces Core Services fails to open due to websocket connection error
common_issues.description: Multiple users on MacOS (versions 15.5 and 15.6) are unable to open Pieces Core Services.  A websocket connection error (404) occurs when attempting to connect to 'http://127.0.0.1:39300/user/last_checked_in/stream#'. The Pieces OS installation path is '/Applications/Pieces OS.app'.  Further investigation into the websocket server and associated services is needed.

related_issues.title: Unable to open Pieces Core Services
related_issues.text:
Unable to open Pieces Core Services
Error: WebSocketException: Connection to 'http://127.0.0.1:39300/user/last_checked_in/stream#' was not upgraded to websocket, HTTP status code: 404

**Installation Details**

Succeeded: true
Path: /Applications/Pieces OS.app

**PiecesOS Information**

ID: 1CA2E830-F290-4091-8714-B38DE27CABCB
User: 32bc4ee9-918c-4562-b3d7-78c22d9dcebe
Current Version: Unknown
Min Version Supported: 12.1.0
Max Version Supported: 13.0.0
Local Port: 39300

**Device Information**

Operating System: MacOS
Current Version: Version 15.6 (Build 24G5065c)
Min Version Supported: 12.0.0 Monterey
Additional Device Information: {cpu_list: [{"architecture":"arm64","cores":8,"logicalProcessors":8,"l1Cache":{"value":65536,"units":"Bytes"},"l2Cache":{"value":4194304,"units":"Bytes"},"description":"Apple M2"}], gpu_list: [{"type":null,"unifiedMemoryArchitecture":true,"cores":10,"dedicatedVRam":null}], memory_info: {"totalRAM":{"value":8589934592,"units":"Bytes"}}, display_list: [{"nativeHeight":1664,"nativeWidth":2560,"scaledHeight":1112,"scaledWidth":1710,"primary":true}]}
Error generating summary: 404 Publisher Model `projects/pi3c3s-cloud-server/locations/us-east1/publishers/google/models/gemini-pro` was not found or your project does not have access to it. Please ensure you are using a valid model version. For more information, see: https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/learn/model-versions

common_issues.title: Pieces Core Services fails to open due to websocket connection error
common_issues.description: Multiple users on MacOS (versions 15.5 and 15.6) are unable to open Pieces Core Services.  The error is a WebSocketException with a 404 HTTP status code when attempting to connect to 'http://127.0.0.1:39300/user/last_checked_in/stream#'. The Pieces OS installation path is '/Applications/Pieces OS.app'.  Further investigation into the websocket connection and server status is needed.

common_issues.title: Pieces Core Services fails to open due to websocket connection error
common_issues.description: Multiple users on MacOS (versions 15.5 and 15.6) are unable to open Pieces Core Services.  A websocket connection error (404) occurs when attempting to connect to 'http://127.0.0.1:39300/user/last_checked_in/stream#'. The Pieces OS app installation path is consistent across reports.  Further investigation into the websocket server and associated services is needed. Ensure the server is running and accessible on the specified port.

common_issues.title: Pieces Core Services fails to open due to WebSocket connection failure
common_issues.description: Multiple users on MacOS (versions 15.5 and 15.6) are unable to open Pieces Core Services.  The error is a WebSocketException with a 404 HTTP status code, indicating the websocket connection to 'http://127.0.0.1:39300/user/last_checked_in/stream#' failed.  The Pieces OS installation path is consistent across reports.  Check local port accessibility and firewall settings. Ensure Pieces OS is running and the websocket endpoint is correctly configured.
